alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 11:54AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and central Broward Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1154 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 to Opa-Locka. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, North Miami, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Medley, Palm Springs North, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Country Club, Pennsuco, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley and Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
